name: Garden's Dilemma
description:
Description

Did you tackle that trouble that came your way

With a resolute heart and cheerful?

Or hide your face from the light of day

With a craven soul and fearful?

This game takes thematical inspiration from the poem How Did You Die by Edmund Vance Cooke and visual inspiration from Claude Monet and Chris Riddell's illustrations of Coraline. Try to traverse through Shoshodur's forest labyrinth and solve puzzles to reach the goal!

How To Play

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

E - Interact
